home.kyons: Kyons, a modern education platform using artificial intelligence (AI), is an effective assistant to help students achieve the desired score in the shortest time with a personalized learning path.

features.youDontKnow:
Don’t know where to start?
Let AI help you!
features.detectKnowledgeHolesDesc: Smart Mock Tests help to detect your weaknesses and focus on reviewing them.
features.learningPathDesc: Lessons are generated based on your learning goals and abilities to optimize revision process.
features.practiceWithDesc: Unlimited numbers of review questions generated by AI with different levels of difficulty

guild.completeLearning: 4 steps to get desired scores easily with Kyons
guild.step1Desc: Kickstart your learning journey by setting your own review goals (subject, grade, and test term).
guild.step2: Step 2: Take the Smart Mock Test
guild.step2Desc: The next step is taking the initial mock test to get a better grip on your current level which will be recorded and analyzed in the system.
guild.step3: Step 3: Practice with learning path generated by AI
guild.step3Desc: Based on your performance, AI will generate a personalised and constantly updated learning path that matches your level and progress.
guild.step4: Step 4: Revise at your own pace with 24/7 support
guild.step4Desc: Every question is tailor-made to match your ability. Kyons has your back with detailed solutions, topic breakdowns to identify knowledge gaps, and one-on-one support to help you whenever you get stuck.

schools.complete: An all-in-one platform to monitor students' learning progress
schools.with: We provide teachers with a smart classroom management solution to closely monitor students' learning progress and refine teaching methods when necessary
schools.usefulTool: An effective tool to monitor student's learning progress
schools.kyonsSchool: Kyons School is a generative self-learning platform for Math, provide teachers with solutions to effectively assigning and tracking student's progress in order to timely modify teaching methods.
schools.have1Desc: Personalised learning path that matches competencies and receptive abilities of every student.
schools.have2Desc: Practice questions are constantly updated and generated by AI to align precisely with the distinct educational requirements.
schools.have3Desc: Teachers can quickly assign and assess homework progress of the entire class.
schools.have4Desc: Kyons will help educators effortlessly generate exams, along with setting completion timeframes for student.

compare.why1: The test test and review questions are created by anyone quickly and automatically
compare.why2: Personalized learning schedule is suitable to the level and goals of each student
compare.why3: Answering questions from remote learners quickly
compare.why4: Automatically evaluate and balance the capacity and time for each learner
compare.why5: Clear and flexible payment packages, suitable for each person's needs
compare.why6: Integrating useful features makes review easier
compare.why7: (Quick notes, time counting clock, schedule settings, revision reminders, ...)
compare.others1: The test and review is more time -consuming
compare.others2: The only study roadmap for all students should not be optimal for different qualifications
compare.others3: The question of the learners takes time to meet and answer from the teacher
compare.others4: Students need to talk to teachers regularly to adjust the amount of exercise
compare.others5: Students need to take place to pay and often have trouble listening to more advice
compare.others6: There are not many other features to support learners

aboutUs.kyons: Kyons - A platform that helps you achieve academic goals in the shortest time
aboutUs.text1: Built by enthusiastic and experienced learners, Kyons is dedicated to provide an effective learning solution to actual challenges.
aboutUs.text2: Kyons believe that learning is a journey that should be both enjoyable and easy to start, enabling each individual to reach their own dreams efficiently.
aboutUs.ethos: Accelerated by World Bank and SUNY-Korea
aboutUs.antler: Invested by Antler Vietnam Venture Capital

problems.why: Study not effectively? See the universe’s messages
problems.explain1: Costly when studying with a tutor to have tailor-made lessons
problems.explain2: Have difficulties in detecting knowledge gaps to revise
problems.explain3: Feel overwhelmed with complex math formulas and concepts
problems.explain4: Lack immediate feedback and support when questions arise
problems.b2bWhy: Why your teaching approach is not effective?
problems.b2b1: Assigned homework does not match an individual's ability
problems.b2b2: Hard to detect knowledge gaps of passive students
problems.b2b3: Homework amount is too large for weaker students

solutions.letKyonsShow: Kyons will provide you solutions to those problems
solutions.feature1desc: Each student will have different questions with the same theory to complete on their own.
solutions.feature2desc: Exercises and tests will be generated by AI based on individual's attainment level.
solutions.feature3desc: Teachers can quickly create new tests with AI-powered question bank and track every student's result.
solutions.feature4desc: Every student has their own study report based on exercise progress, or knowledge gaps that need filling. Teachers, then, can support students timely.
solutions.use: Master Kyons School with 5 easy steps
solutions.step3: AI generates unique questions by topic
solutions.step5: AI automatically marks and analyzes results
solutions.step6: From report, teachers can easily understand each student's attainment ability and modify teaching methods
solutions.result1: Completed exercises compared to traditional approach per month
solutions.result4: Incorrect concepts that are automatically processed

preorder.title: You are registering
preorder.step1Desc: Please fill in your information correctly in the form below:
preorder.name: Full name
preorder.notice:
Note:
  • If you have any problems, please hit Kyons fanpage a message with your pre-order code for support.
  • If you already have Kyons account, use the email that you registered.
  • If not, Kyons will create one for you with the above email and send a password to your email So please check your information carefully before submitting it :3
preorder.step2Desc: Scan the QR code or copy banking information below to transfer

alreadyPreorder: You have already registered for a study plan before
alreadyPreorderDesc:
Your information has been used to register for the learning package already.

Please try again with different information or contact Kyons fanpage for further assistance.
alreadyTransferDesc: Have you completed the transfer step for this transaction?

orderSuccess.desc:
Kyons has received the information and is currently processing it.

If you don't receive a confirmation email within 24 hours, please send a screenshot of the successful transaction to Kyons fanpage for support!
